attributes.action: Fakland Islands and Argentina to recover normal Relations through an Artificial Island in The Georgias Basin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To create an artificial Island near the
Georgias  basin .--.Based on ultimate 
engineering and of adequate size of 
a base .--. powered by solar energy
that assures security in the Southern
Atlantic Ocean.-.The return of the Islands to Argentina have Unimaginable
Positive Situations for the Government of Your Majesty and for us The Honest Argentine people who cannót share the great possibilities comming from a normal relationship with England .....
We have space stations why we cannót have artificial Islands on neutral waters................

rejection.details:
Dear Sir

Please note you must be a British citizen or resident to create a petition. 

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
